entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
